interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Dry Weightless Hair Volume and Texture Spray | Dry Texture Spray for Hair | Texturizing Spray | Sulfate and Cruelty Free 244ml (7oz)
Review Date: 2022/05/13
Store: Osensia
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All, Dry, Fine', 'Liquid Volume': '7 Fluid Ounces', 'Brand': 'Osensia', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '7.0 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 1.93 x 1.89 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '850001832274'}
Review Text: I have short, fine hair that is too often weighed down by most sprays. Thought I would give this a shot. Washed and dried my hair, it was looking good. One BLAST of this stuff totally destroyed my do, leaving me with a mess of hair that I couldn't do anything with. Too sticky for a dry shampoo that others said it was a family member of, no hold like a traditional hair spray. Into the trash it goes. It does spell good, though. :)
Review Title: I was thinking "hair spray".  I was wrong
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
JOYYUM 1000W 2-in-1 Hot Air Spin Brush Styler Auto-rotating Negative Ionic Hair Curler Dryer Brush, 1 1/2 Inch and 2 Inch Brush Attachments, Lavander Fog
JOYYUM
{'Brand': 'JOYYUM', 'Material': 'Titanium', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Comb, Portable, Massage, Hot', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Curling', 'Package Dimensions': '16.3 x 5.4 x 3.2 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'UPC': '787414814279', 'Manufacturer': 'JOYYUM'}
Hard to rate this as it does not work with fine, layered hair. It has no clamp to hold hair in place so it just spins right out. Might work with longer, fine hair that is of one length.
Not great with fine, layered hair
JDO Eyelash Curler and 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Value Set-Lash Curler with Refill Pads for No Pinching or Pulling, Mascara Natural Thickening- Long Lasting Waterproof & Smudge-Proof
JDO
{'Package Dimensions': '6 x 4 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
I double applied the mascara just to see a difference. There wasn't much between my natural lashes and the made up ones. I found that my lashes also clumped together. As far as waterproof? In this dismal time of masks I found that i sweat like crazy with it on. My regular mascara is not water proof and inevitability ended up on my upper cheeks. So I had high hopes for this. The odd thing kid I didn't see any mascara running down my face, but at the end if the day I had very little mascara left on my lashes. Hmm. So thus is my take. If you want a really nice lash curler, this would be a good choice. It comes with three additional pads for future use. The handle is held shut by a removable plastic piece. Why, I'm not sure. For packaging? At any rate it works very well. The mascara? I think of it as emergency makeup.
Love the curler, meh on the mascara
allez outdoor | Biodegradable Cleansing Cloths | Natural Plant-Based Face and Body Wipes | PH Balanced | Cactus Bloom and Chaparral Scent | 20ct Individually Wrapped Towelettes
Allez
{'Brand': 'Allez', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Unit Count': '20.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 5.4 x 4.2 inches; 13.62 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ABWPS001', 'UPC': '860000823210', 'Manufacturer': 'Allez Outdoor, LLC'}
These wipes are great for a quick wash up. Each individually wrapped sheet is about the size of a piece of standard copy paper. They hold up well through the whole wash. I personally don't care for the scent. I felt like I'd rubbed down with a pine tree car freshener, but that's just me. Words of caution.  It says good from nose to toes. It tastes nasty though, so beware when using it near your mouth. Ugh. I'll be keeping mine in my vehicle for unexpected spills and a messy four year old. This would be a great product for hikers with no access to water and a need to freshen up.
Works great for quick clean ups
7pcs Pearl Hair Clips Large Hair Clips Pins Barrette Ties Hair Headwear Barrette for Party Wedding Daily, Gift for Girls and Women
MEETWIN
{'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 3.5 x 0.2 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '723668014119'}
These barrettes are exactly as pictured, quite lovely. It should be noted that they are quite large, at least 3" long, so not designed for little girls. Beautiful for teens or adults. Easy to use, look pretty well made.
Lovely, large barrettes
Portable Travel Bottles Set,Leak Proof Squeezable Silicon Tubes Travel Size Toiletries Containers,TSA Approved Refillable Travel Accessories for Shampoo Liquids (1.3Oz,4 Pack)
ZAYOR
{'Brand': 'ZAYOR', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Capacity': '1.3 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 1.38 x 3.54 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 1.38 x 3.54 inches; 4.02 Ounces', 'UPC': '729993071100'}
Love these!  I had purchased individual bottles of hand sanitizer long before Covid-19 became an issue, at a pretty dear price per ounce. When the sanitizers became scarce I actually made my own using aloe vera, alcohol and orange oil.  It turned out ok, but I lacked small bottles to divide it up.  I eventually found some 2 oz bottles, but they did not have these great carabiners to hook onto purses, backpacks, belts, etc.  These bottle are really well made, with a good thickness to them and easily loaded.  The sanitizer I have hooked to my purse now is actually in a little rubber "holster". I am constantly snagging it on things that make the bottle fall out. This product will take care of that problem, hands down. These would also be great for hiking/camping. Perfect size for hand soap, shampoo, etc, that can be hooked to a backpack and not weigh down the user.
Great multi use bottles
Organic Dry Shampoo Light - Dry Shampoo Travel Size, Hair Powder Dry Shampoo for Women and Men, Volumizing Powder for Hair and Texture Powder, Hair Volume Powder for Blonde Hair
Beauty by Earth
{'Brand': 'Beauty by Earth', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.5 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 1.3 x 1.3 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '850003968254'}
I have tried many brands of dry shampoo, most I have liked.  This product was an adventure. First off, it is literally dry, not in an aerosol type of container.  You screw open the top (like and elmers glue bottle) and shake onto your head. Well. The little safety piece of cardboard was not attached to the bottle but stuck in the lid.  I did not know this until I tried to use it to no avail. And when you open the bottle be prepared for stuff to fly out. When I did get to the point I could use it, it turned out to be so light colored and obvious on my head I had to work it well into my hair, brush and shake my head so it was not such a glaring product. I will admit it did a great job in "thickening" my very fine hair, but it really needs to come in colors; blonde, brunette, etc. so it is not so obvious.  Will I buy it again? Probably not, but it will go into my travel bag for emergency use if I have the time to shake, rattle and roll my head.
Decent product but has some issues
BeautyGARDE MAGIC Charcoal Facial Cleanser - detoxifying and anti-pollution face cleanser, Nonie Creme
BeautyGARDE
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 2.13 x 7.75 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1201', 'UPC': '856365007242'}
My son really liked this cleanser. He is a bearded fellow to sometimes cleansers can be problematic when trying to rinse out. This product works really well for him and his girlfriend. I have used many charcoal products and have always been pleased with the outcome. This cleanser is easy to use and leaves the skin feeling smooth and refreshed.
works well, a hit with my adult son
MIRACLE Gold Straight Razor, Straight Edge Razor Non-Slip Sustainable Metal Handle, Black Cutthroat Barber Razor Holder, Disposable Straight Razor Blades Kit
Miracle
{'Brand': 'Miracle', 'Number of Blades': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Handle Material': 'Stainless,Stainless Steel,Metal Handle,Aluminium,Metal,Steel', 'Color': 'Gold'}
My son tried this out on his beard to shape it up. It didn't work well on the beard part, but was okay in taking off the fine hairs on his cheeks. The whole set up is very flimsy, feels cheap with just a so so outcome after use. This might be good for anyone just starting to shave that might want to graduate to a straight edge down the road. Just don't expect professional results if you have an established beard you want to maintain. My son's beard is not particularly dense but enough so that this is a no go for him. Maintaining a light beard or the 5 oclock shadow look might be possible.
definitely not professional tool

This box has everything you or a best bud needs for some r & r at home. Stemless wine cup, a candle and other goodies: add a hot bath, some bubbles and a bottle of something tasty; lock the door and a good book. What more can a woman ask for? Treat yourself, a sister, mom, best friends or all of the above. Very nice gift in a sturdy box.
All it needs is a bottle of wine

profile:
**User Summary:**

The user continues to emphasize multifunctional and stylish beauty tools, particularly for hair styling and personal grooming, alongside a strong inclination toward self-care gifts. Their latest purchase, however, reflects a growing need for effective hair products, which contrasts their previous high ratings for aesthetics and quality. This interaction reveals a more critical perspective on products that do not meet their expectations, as evidenced by their recent review for a hair spray that did not perform as intended.

**Product Features**: While they appreciate effective and aesthetically pleasing products, the recent purchase highlighted the importance of actual performance, especially when it comes to hair care solutions. The dissatisfaction noted in the review indicates a clear preference for user-friendly tools that deliver on their promises without compromising style.

**Review Patterns**: The user's reviews remain constructive, but the recent critique showcases a shift towards a vigilant approach regarding product effectiveness. They still emphasize the significance of shared experiences, but less as a joy in gifting and more about personal satisfaction.

**Rating Tendency**: Previously, the user rated products around 3.5, with a notable increase to 5.0 for items that met their aesthetic and functional standards. The new rating of 2.0 reflects a more discerning attitude, highlighting their ongoing commitment to quality and effectiveness while navigating a balance between style and functionality. The user remains focused on well-designed beauty products suitable for personal grooming and strategic gifting.
